nodes.text: Rock beetles were six-legged insects that lived in the deserts of Tatooine. A large population of rock beetles was known to live in an area known as Rock Beetle Refuge. The cook Porcellus used rock beetle and cave beetle carcasses to make beetle broth for his master, Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
Rock beetles are almost identical to rockmites and cave beetles, using the same base model with different textures.
